item.title: Collect, Analyze and Visualize Jolokia Metrics Using Elastic Stack
item.author: jshankarc1@gmail.com (Jayashankar Chaluvaraj)
item.description: Note: This post is originally from my https://jshankarc.blogspot.com and now moved it to github pages. Introduction The main motivation for developing this POC is to monitor CPU and memory usage of the 45 containers and the current tools or technology which were used does not provide out of the box features to enable it. I found ELK stack is the quickest and possible solution to solve this issue. Elastic Stack is powerful, interesting and easy to get started with some basic knowledge about the individual components and their integration patterns.
item.dc:creator: Jayashankar Chaluvaraj

item.title: Message Tracking Solution using Apache Camel, JBoss Fuse, Elastic Stack and Syslog
item.author: jshankarc1@gmail.com (Jayashankar Chaluvaraj)
item.description: Note: This post is originally from my https://jshankarc.blogspot.com and now moved it to github pages. Introduction It was long time plan to write a blog on Apache Camel and finally came up with an idea that felt interesting to me and hope you will enjoy it. The solution to integrate camel with Jboss Fuse, Syslog and Elastic Stack eventually becomes a design. I would like to start by stating a problem and then discuss about solving it step by step.
